content.body: looking now at https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/11697 I find that the CSP spec no browsers seem to conform to the CSP spec requirement to block `element.style.cssText = 'display:none'` in the same way they block `element.setAttribute('style', 'display:none;')`
content.formatted_body: looking now at https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/11697 I find that the CSP spec no browsers seem to conform to the CSP spec requirement to block element.style.cssText = 'display:none' in the same way they block element.setAttribute('style', 'display:none;')

content.body: and looking at WPT, I find we have no tests for it https://wpt.fyi/results/content-security-policy/style-src?label=experimental&label=master&aligned
